text:
It appears there were no security fixes for Office this month. The only
security-related change I saw was the turning off of FBX files by default. 
That said, there WAS a release this month for all channels according to
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/officeupdates/update-history-microsoft365-apps-by-date
 
image.png [cid:ii_lr8f7v2p0] 
But looking at the 365 Apps Admin Center (https://config.office.com
)
none of our devices have gotten it yet (we have all devices set to Monthly
Enterprise) and the next release is coming on 1/9/24. This is the first month I
have seen this happen. Anyone else seeing this? 
image.png [cid:ii_lr8f8l7n1] 
--
%2BSdsNFtzfogp7kTw%2BDx5pG5Uhyp_CpbQjXoQZfcaHuF%3D0Z0ew%40mail.gmail.com

metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] January 2024 Office 365 Apps updates
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from craigslist4md@gmail.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
It appears there were no security fixes for Office this month. The only
security-related change I saw was the turning off of FBX files by default. 
That said, there WAS a release this month for all channels according to
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/officeupdates/update-history-microsoft365-apps-by-date
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flearn.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Fofficeupdates%2Fupdate-history-microsoft365-apps-by-date&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C6355af98f89f45f23fbc08dc12388c42%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638405281292357321%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=tUc3tB7cYPJmL1q8Usp%2FNlXpEb%2FSTkwWydoXW3YnNVY%3D&reserved=0] 
image.png [cid:ii_lr8f7v2p0] 
But looking at the 365 Apps Admin Center (https://config.office.com
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fconfig.office.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C6355af98f89f45f23fbc08dc12388c42%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638405281292357321%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=7r9gCKYEKp72bHcWLgsMC0YRS0TZIBAnX%2Fmx5AdBcqU%3D&reserved=0])
none of our devices have gotten it yet (we have all devices set to Monthly
Enterprise) and the next release is coming on 1/9/24. This is the first month I
have seen this happen. Anyone else seeing this? 
image.png [cid:ii_lr8f8l7n1] 
--
